title: Love > Rush
description:
2. Fall in Happy
Kanoto, an exclusive writer for Disaster Jewel (D.J.) which is headed by Yokuna and Kagari but writing is not his only job...

7. Honey Edge
Businessman Kiminari runs into his former classmate Masataka, but Masataka is no longer the serious student Kiminari remembers. Especially when he kidnaps Kiminari and drugs him!
